TEXT.S: Charles B. Black sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1921 , ryax sa tay 15 nqu tay 6, Charles B. Black, squliq na p'unro. (mhuqil sa kawas tay 1992) 196 kunbun kinwagiq nya, 91 kunkin kin'suw nya, hiya ga qutux nqu spzyang blaq na ppzuy mari NBA. qyanux nya Black htagan beh sa aytahco aq tmasoq mqwas maki Kansas City, Missouri Southwest pqwasan biru. Black ga sraral mtzyaw maki Kansas ru maki kosi ppqumah. kawas tay 1984 wal wayan mhngaw la maki beh Rogers, Arkansas. hiya ga maki 1992 kawas 12 byacing 22 ryax wal mhuqil la.(pitu' pgal kawas) pincyuwagan nya' pspngan mari sa may yugal yacing masuq mspung mari sa pspngan mari na maycyugal byacing lga
